5 This information supports the information needs of financial market participants subject to Regulation (EU) 2019/2088 because
it is derived from an additional indicator related to principal adverse impact as set out by indicator #10 in Table 2 of Annex 1 of
the related Delegated Regulation with regard to disclosure rules on sustainable investments (“Land degradation, desertification,
